content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/open-compass/opencompass.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image.
FROM python:3.10-slim

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install Conda (optional, may not be necessary in slim version)
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y curl && \
    curl -sSL https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh -o miniconda.sh && \
    bash miniconda.sh -b -p /opt/conda && \
    rm miniconda.sh && \
    /opt/conda/bin/conda install -y python=3.10 && \
    ln -s /opt/conda/bin/conda /usr/bin/conda

# Create and activate the opencompass environment
RUN /opt/conda/bin/conda create --name opencompass python=3.10 -y && \
    /opt/conda/bin/conda run -n opencompass pip install -e .

# Install required dependencies for OpenCompass
RUN /opt/conda/bin/conda run -n opencompass pip install opencompass[api] && \
    /opt/conda/bin/conda run -n opencompass pip install "opencompass[lmdeploy]"

# Run the tests
RUN /opt/conda/bin/conda run -n opencompass pytest tests/

vm_control.OutOfStorage:
